Ivareta git historikk ved file renaming

Sun Sep 24 2023 14:43:34 GMT+0200 (Central European Summer Time)

If√∏lge https://koukia.ca/rename-or-move-files-in-git-e7259bf5a0b7

Hvis du vil v√¶re sikker p√• at file history blir ivaretatt i en fil om du renamer den (eller flytter den), s√• m√• du bruke commando-linja og kj√∏re

git mv mycoolclass.cs myCoolClass.cs

eller

git mv layout/CardList common/List

Hvis du renamer direkte i editor-en, s√• kan du ikke v√¶re sikker p√• at git skj√∏nner at det er samme fil.

N√•r du ivaretar git history s√• kan du bruke ting som git log -p --follow -- path/to/filename. Se gist: https://gist.github.com/paalss/7127b421ff7f3a862ae8d76c772aeb6a

Kommentarer:

Mulig det er un√∏dvendig √• bruke mv. Da jeg renamet og flyttet layout/CardList til common/List s√• skj√∏nte git at disse to filene var 74% like.

git log -p --follow components/common/List/List.tsx funker fjell. Historikken strekker seg tilbake til f√∏r renamingen

Delete all branches listed by `git branch -a`

Sun Sep 24 2023 14:43:08 GMT+0200 (Central European Summer Time)

F√¶rre antall branches i code completion suggestion n√•r du skriver git checkout feat-[Tab].

Slett alle branches som ikke finnes p√• remote:

git fetch -p (prune)

Task warrior (CLI todo app)

Sat Sep 16 2023 23:29:13 GMT+0200 (Central European Summer Time)

Installer p√• Ubuntu (WSL)

sudo apt-get install taskwarrior

https://taskwarrior.org/download/

Oppstart

task version

yes for √• lage config file (.taskrc)

Bruk

üìç Legg til task

task add bla bla bla bla

üìå - med priority

task priority:H add bla bla bla bla

üìÖüìÉ List opp alle tasks

task next

next kan sl√∏yfes

‚úî Gjennomf√∏r task nr X

task X done

‚ùå üóë Slett

task X delete

https://taskwarrior.org/docs/30second/

üí¨üó® Se og rediger alle detalljer

task X edit

üóÉ Opprett i prosjekter

task add project:Kitchen Select floor tiles
task add project:Kitchen Measure counter-top
task add project:Kitchen Design placement of electrical outlets
task add project:Kitchen Locate ideal placement for extractor duct
task add project:Kitchen Select and order counter-top material
task add project:Kitchen Talk to the Electrician about when the work can start

https://taskwarrior.org/docs/best-practices/

Syntax highlighting i Nano commit diff

Sat Sep 16 2023 23:25:12 GMT+0200 (Central European Summer Time)

nano ~/.nanorc

sett inn

https://gist.github.com/keithamus/736220/5e069767b22841610ee18fd2f92bd6026f5eb41d

syntax "gitcommit" "COMMIT_EDITMSG$"
color white "#.*"
color green "#.(modified|added|deleted|unmerged|copy-edit|rename).*"
color yellow start="# Changes.*" end="# Changed.*"
color brightgreen "^\+.*"
color brightred "^-.*"
color brightyellow "(diff|index|---|\+\+\+).*"
color brightmagenta "@@.*"
color white "# Changes .*"
color white "# Changed .*"
color white "#.*\(use .*"
color white "#$"

=

farger i git commit vinduet!
